column4: I need an app that would wake me up in 10mins. any idea? ahehehe. I have my speakers on :D
a command.. just do somthing along the lines of scheduling aplay alert.wav with 'at' in ten minutes
my dad won't buy me a new one sooon
is there any gnome kalarm or ktimer? :D
sounds nnice, Pici. looks like I can nap now :D
but /real geeks/ do it on the command line.... so have a nice dream about a 50 lbs. unix manual :-)
